name: Fox vs Fox (beta)
description:
** To enjoy the game in full view, please press Cmd + " - " (minus symbol) [for Mac] or Ctrl + " - " [for PC] to zoom out OR scroll to the bottom and play in fullscreen mode after pressing "Run game." Thank you!**

The Two Foxes

One day, a fox met another fox-like creature. "I'm an alien-fox. My aim is to take over the earth. We are the best species of fox in the universe. You will be replaced" The alien-fox said. "No, we are the best foxes! We are fast and we can move swiftly. Let's have a competition to prove who is the best!" A competition between the earth's fox and the alien fox is going to start!

Rules:
  • Red player gets 2 points from each cherry & 1 point from each gem. 
  • Blue player gets 2 points from each gem & 1 point from each cherry. 
  • Each player can steal a maximum of 3 points from the other player by stepping on him/ her! If they don't have 3 points at that time, all their scores go into your pocket!
  • After collecting the boots, the player gain 3 bullets
Control of players:

Red player

  • Navigation: A, W, S, D 
  • Fire button: E

Blue player

  • Navigation: Arrow Keys
  • Fire button: /
Credits:

Sound Designer - Benjamin Willis
